title: Astronomers discover the earliest, hottest galaxy cluster in the universe, and it breaks all the rules
description: The galaxy cluster appears hotter and more mature than it should for its young age, challenging what we think we know about how these cities of galaxies form.
content: The galaxy cluster appears hotter and more mature than it should for its young age, challenging what we think we know about how these cities of galaxies form.
